articles.title: At event in Boston, Biden calls these ‘dark days’ as he urges Americans to ‘get back up’
articles.description:
“America is not a fairy tale. For 250 years, it’s been a constant push and pull, an existential struggle between peril and possibility,” Biden said Sunday after receiving the Lifetime Achievement Award from the Edward M. Kennedy Institute.

The post At event in Boston, Biden calls these ‘dark days’ as he urges Americans to ‘get back up’ appeared first on Boston.com.
